choices.answer: Inform your parents and ask them to call PA
Inform your team leader immediately
Inform your team leader after feeling better
Tuck yourself back to bed and telepathy to your team leader

questions.question: YOU WAKE UP DISCOVERING YOU ARE SICK AND UNABLE TO ATTEND THE ACTUAL EVENT

choices.answer: Ask him/her to follow you to F1 Pit and check out Chingay
Explain Chingay to them and refer them to the website
Keep quiet and act blur
Ignore and carry on walking

questions.question: THE PUBLIC ASK YOU ABOUT CHINGAY AND YOU ARE NOT SURE OF THE ANSWER
YOU DON’T FEEL WELL DURING THE OPERATIONS

choices.answer: Inform your partner, and then head home to rest.
Tahan throughout the show because Chingay needs YOU!
Inform your leader.
Find a corner to rest.
Run away and look for someone of the same built to handle him
Dial 999 and request for help
STOMP him and try to win $50
Try to calm him down and request help from others

questions.question: A FAMILY COMES TO YOU TELLING THEM THEIR CHILD IS MISSING

choices.answer: Ask them to go to the lost and found counter to look for the child
Bring the family to the Exco and let them handle
Ask them for their details and child information, relay the SOIC/PA Team
Dial 999 and request for help

questions.question: A CHILD COMES TO YOU LOOKING FOR HIS/HER PARENT

choices.answer: Ask the child to go to the lost and found counter to look for their parent
Bring the child to the Exco and let them handle
Have the child to stay with you, and inform your SOIC
Dial 999 and request for help
Perform CPR/first-aid immediately
Clear the surrounding area, get someone to call for help
Carry him/her to the first aid point
Dial 995 and request for help
Go to the Carnival Area
Go to SG Flyer
Call Food Panda
Tell him/her that my meal is provided so I don't know

questions.question: A PUBLIC ASKS YOU WHERE HE/SHE CAN PURCHASE SOME FOOD OR DRINKS
A PUBLIC ASKS YOU WHERE CAN HE/SHE WATCH THE PARADE WITHOUT AN ENTRY TICKET

choices.answer: Delayed telecast one week later
Take the SG Flyer and get the bird-eye view
Apologise and say that only ticketed audience are allowed
Go to the Carnival Area behind SG Flyer
Take him into your team and inform the Exco
Walkie-talkie to everyone to claim their missing volunteer
Find the Admin Exco where he/she belongs to and send him there
Ask him/her to go home

questions.question: A VOLUNTEER COMES TO YOU NOT KNOWING WHERE THEY SHOULD GO

choices.answer: Wear a magic cloak and disappear
Inform your leader and leave
Text the Admin Phone
Inform your leader/SOIC and sign out at Admin Booth

questions.question: YOU HAVE TO LEAVE EARLY DURING THE EVENT

choices.answer: Accede to his/ her request
Explain to them politely that sizes were pre-ordered based on application
Find someone who is willing to exchange T-shirt size
Tell him or her ‘too bad, live with it’

questions.question: A VOLUNTEER REQUESTS TO CHANGE T-SHIRT SIZE
A VOLUNTEER HAS LOST HIS/HER EVENT PASS

choices.answer: Verify particulars if he/she is truly one of our pm volunteer, issue pass
Stay at the volunteer tentage to help out in admin and logs
Volunteer is excused from duty and can go have fun at the carnival
Escort him/her to his/her deployment location
Ask the performer to leave a deposit of $50 behind
Offer more logs items you think may be useful to them
Act blur
Explain that the logs are meant for pm volunteer unable to accede to others

questions.question: ONE OF THE PERFORMERS APPROACH YOU AND ASKS IF HE/SHE CAN BORROW A LOGS ITEM

choices.answer: Clarify with the EXCO if in doubt
Point to any direction and hopes it is the correct one
Pretend you didn’t hear a thing
Shout out the Chingay group name

questions.question: ONE OF THE PERFORMERS APPROACH YOU AND ASKS FOR DIRECTIONS TO THEIR ASSEMBLY AREA
